title: [BUG] Unused SKString instance in SKTextBlobBuilder
body:
**Description**

<!-- a general description goes here -->
This line is an unnecessary performance hit. We should reuse a dummy instance because we don't use it anyways.

https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/master/binding/Binding/SKTextBlob.cs#L265

Also passing a language only makes sense when `TextEncoding != GlyphId`

Creating and destructing this SKString instance takes about 6% of processing time in my current test. So I consider this a major issue.
